            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_2" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">

            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_2">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Who's self-employed?
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_3" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">A self-employed person is a sole proprietor or a partner in a business, or someone who works for themselves and is not employed as an employee.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Who's exempt from enrolling in an MPF scheme?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">People who legally do not need to enrol in an MPF scheme include:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li>Domestic employees</li> 
 <li>Self-employed licensed hawkers</li> 
 <li>Persons covered by statutory pension or provident fund schemes, such as civil servants and subsidised or grant school teachers</li> 
 <li>Members of occupational retirement schemes that have been granted exemption certificates</li> 
 <li>Non-permanent residents from overseas who enter Hong Kong for the purposes of employment for less than 13 months, or who are covered by overseas retirement schemes</li> 
 <li>Employees of the European Union Office of the European Commission in Hong Kong</li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    </div>
</div></div>

        
    


        </div>
    
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_6" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="O-TITLE-RW-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region"><div id="content_main_title_3">
    
    

    <h2 class="A-BBST28R-RW-ALL">
            Responsibilities of self-employed persons
    </h2>
    <div class="row">
        <div class="sm-12 organismsContainer">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_4" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you are self-employed, you must enrol in an MPF scheme regardless of your relevant income or whether a business registration is required.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">Once you've enrolled, you must inform the trustee of the following:</p> 
<ul class="A-LSTU-RW-ALL"> 
 <li><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Your relevant income</strong></p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You must notify the administrator before 1 June each year of your relevant income for the next financial year of the scheme (ie 1 July to 30 June). The administrator will send you a letter together with a Self-employed Person Relevant Income Declaration Form <a href="/content/dam/hsbc/hk/docs/mpf/in24.pdf" target="_blank" rel="noopener"><span aria-hidden="true">IN24 [PDF]</span><span class="visuallyhidden">IN24 [PDF]  开启新窗口</span></a> in April each year.</p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If we don't hear from you, it'll be regarded as acknowledgement that your relevant income has not changed from the last scheme financial year.</p> </li> 
 <li><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Your chosen payment frequency and contributions</strong></p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you want to modify the frequency or payment basis for the next financial year of the scheme, you must also notify the administrator before 1 June each year. You can make annual or monthly contributions and pay for them by direct debit or by cheque.</p> </li> 
 <li><p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Any change to your circumstances or contact details</strong></p> <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you start to work for someone else, you can elect to transfer your accrued benefits to an HSBC MPF personal account. You can also transfer your accrued benefits to your new employer's MPF scheme or another scheme of your choice.</p> </li> 
</ul>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-SIMPLELINKS-DEV O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region">
    <div id="content_main_simplelinks_3">

        </a>
    </div>

</li>
        </ul>
    </div>

<h3 class="heading A-TYP22L-RW-ALL " id="content_main_heading_2">
    <a>Relevant income and contributions  </a>
</h3>
</div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_5" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You should calculate your mandatory contributions based on your relevant income and pay the contributions to your MPF trustee before the end of each contribution period.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>What is relevant income?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If you're self-employed, your relevant income is defined as the assessable profits in your most recent Notice of Assessment from the Inland Revenue Department.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>How should the self-employed make contributions?</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can choose to pay your MPF contributions either once a month or once a year.</p>
</div></div>

        
    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-SMPTBL-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV" role="region" style="width: auto;"><div data-accessibility-tick-icon-text="适用" data-accessibility-cross-icon-text="不适用" id="content_main_simpletable_1" class="table-wrapper" style="overflow-x: auto;">

<th scope="col" style="text-align: center; width: auto;"><strong>Per year</strong></th>

HKD360,000 x 5% per year<br>
</td>
</tr></tbody></table>

</div></div>

<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">HSBC MPF also offers you an easy way to make voluntary contributions through Flexi-Contributions.</p>

            <span class="chevron"></span>
        </div>
        <section id="-1072281611__panel0" class="exp-content" aria-hidden="true" tabindex="-1">

<div id="content_main_columnControl_8">
    <div class="cc cc-columns-100 ">
        
        <div id="content_main_columnControlColumn_12" class="cc-column">
            




    
        
        
            
            
            
            
            <div class="M-CONTMAST-RW-RBWM O-SMARTSPCGEN-DEV rich-text" role="region"><div id="content_main_richtext_10" class=" A-PAR16R-RW-ALL-WRAPPER" data-date-format="M/D/YYYY" data-time-format="HH:MM:SS A" data-zone="America/New_York">
    <p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Through online banking or the MPF Member Hotline:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If we receive your instructions through online banking or the MPF Member Hotline at or before 4pm on a business day, your instructions will be processed on the same day. If we receive your instructions after 4pm on a business day, or any time on a Saturday, Sunday or public holiday, they'll be processed the following business day.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">An acknowledgement will confirm the receipt of your instructions. When your instructions have been processed successfully, we'll send a confirmation notice to your online banking message inbox or post a confirmation notice to you.<br> </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Through paper forms:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">After receiving your completed form, your instructions will be processed within 5 business days. A confirmation will be sent to you after the instructions have been processed successfully. </p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">You can submit the change in investment form by mail or by placing them in an <a href="/zh-cn/mpf/services/#drop-in-box">'MPF Drop-In Box' at designated branches</a>.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL"><strong>Note:</strong></p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">If the processing of your Portfolio Rebalance or Asset Switch instruction is scheduled on any day that (i) the transfer of benefits under Employee Choice Arrangement ('ECA Transfer') is to be processed, or (ii) the refund of long service payment/severance payment ('Refund of LSP/SP') is to be processed, or (iii) on any of the consecutive days that ECA Transfer and/or Refund of LSP/SP are to be processed, the processing of your Portfolio Rebalance or Asset Switch instruction will be postponed to the next business day after the day(s) that such ECA Transfer and/or Refund of LSP/SP is/are being processed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">In any of the above circumstances, the processing of any further Portfolio Rebalance or Asset Switch instruction made before the processing of any prior pending consecutive Portfolio Rebalance instruction(s), Asset Switch instruction(s), ECA Transfer and/or Refund of LSP/SP will be postponed to the next business day after the day(s) that such pending consecutive Portfolio Rebalance instruction(s), Asset Switch instruction(s), ECA Transfer and/or Refund of LSP/SP is/are being processed.</p> 
<p class="A-PAR16R-RW-ALL">The above processing time is for reference only. We're not be liable for any delays.</p>
</div></div>
